definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Comments, industry leader who also makes no secret of their endeavors.
sentences.chinese: 言談中，行業領頭羊們也毫不諱言各自的努力方向。

sentences.english: My style is showing leadership through exa good instead of merely words.
sentences.chinese: 我的領導風格是行動先於言談，一馬當先。
要知道，你的言談舉止都被孩子看在眼裏。

sentences.english: His wife has had a civilizing influence on him.
sentences.chinese: 他妻子對改進他言談舉止有潛移默化的影響。

sentences.english: The lady is elegant in her manners and her speech.
sentences.chinese: 那位女士舉止言談優雅得體。

sentences.english: Humor is the speech of wisdom that mocks self, not others.
sentences.chinese: 詼諧是智慧的言談，它是自我調侃，而非諷刺別人。

sentences.english: Speak, stone jiao found cheung Po ts ai coming on to her sister.
sentences.chinese: 言談間，石嬌發現張保仔對娣妹有意思。

sentences.english: That little girl comported herself very well at the party last night.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩昨晚在晚會上言談舉止很得體。

sentences.english: In addition, the public must learn to Beijing civilized Yantanjuzheng.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，北京市民也必須學會文明的言談舉止。

sentences.english: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others.
sentences.chinese: 當你的言談舉止利人利己時，幸福就會來到你身邊。

sentences.english: She had been genteelly bred, was sensible, lively, and of a most pleasing conversation.
sentences.chinese: 她受過教育，聰明而活潑，言談也很有趣。

sentences.english: His wife has had a civilizing influence on him.
sentences.chinese: 他妻子對改進他舉止言談有潛移默化的影響。

sentences.english: You detest superficiality ; you'd rather be alone than have to suffer through small talk.
sentences.chinese: 你討厭表面的虛浮，寧願獨處也不要忍受無味的言談。

sentences.english: And in much of your talking, thinking is half murdered.
sentences.chinese: 在許多言談中，你們的思想幾乎一半被扼殺。

sentences.english: Otherwise, even the smartest comments would "occasion envy and disgust."
sentences.chinese: 否則，即便是最聰明的言談也會“導致嫉妒和厭惡”。

definition: unceasing torrent (idiom)/talking non-stop/gabbling forty to the dozen
